# Inspection Services for Pressure Vessel Devices

## Solicitation Title
EF934-240662

## Reference Number
WS4359113091-Doc4359410196

## Amendment Number
1

## Publication Date
2024-02-01

## Tender Closing Date and Time
2024-02-26T14:00:00

## Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites proposals for the provision of inspection services for pressure vessel devices. This includes annual and/or bi-annual inspections of boilers, pressurized vessels, and piping systems, as well as the associated safety devices.

## Locations

The inspections will be conducted at various government and public organizations located in the Province of Quebec and at other sites regulated by federal laws.

## Eligibility

This solicitation is open to all qualified suppliers.

## Evaluation Criteria

Proposals will be evaluated based on a combined score of technical merit and price.

## Terms and Conditions

* Quotations must be submitted electronically.
* The notice and complete tender documents are available on the online tendering platform.
* This solicitation is subject to the terms and conditions of the contract.

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact Andy Doucette at [andy.doucette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:andy.doucette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) or refer to the "Contact Information" section of the related tender.

## Related Documents

Please refer to the online tendering platform for access to all relevant tender documents.

## Trade Agreements

This solicitation is open to Canadian suppliers who are eligible to participate under the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and other applicable trade agreements.
